snippet.name: Latest blog posts
snippet.html:
{ com_singlerow( id:'{{ component_id_1 }}', description:'Form Heading', htmlElement:'h2' ) }
    { com_keys ( id:'{{ component_id }}', syncId:'{{ sync_id }}', description:'Latest posts', htmlElement:'li', html:' {{ keys.title }} ', limit: '5', sortBy:'publishedDate descending' ) }
